concept.title: Searching for SubNetwork Managed Object Types

section.p: The SubNetwork provides a flexible way to define a network topology. A top most parent SubNetwork instance can also have a SubNetwork child and a SubNetwork grandchild, therefore 3 tiers of SubNetwork are possible.
Network Explorer provides the following syntax to allow a user to assemble a query describing all three layers:
section.codeblock: SubNetwork where object SubNetwork has child MeContext
section.p: SubNetwork syntax in Criteria Builder follows the same pattern as the above.
